```{r, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```

```{r setup}
library(scattermore2)
data <- cbind(rnorm(1e5), rnorm(1e5))
c1 <- colorize_data(data, RGBA= c(64,128,192,50), xlim=c(-5,5), ylim=c(-5,5))
c2 <- colorize_data(data, RGBA= c(192,128,64,50), xlim=c(-5,5), ylim=c(-5,5))
```

## Combine two rgbwt matrices (result of colorization)
```{r}
comb <- combine_two_rgbwt(c1,c2)
raster <- rgba_int_to_raster(rgbwt_to_rgba_int(comb))
plot(raster)
```

## Combine two rgba float matrices
```{r}
c1_frgba <- rgbwt_to_rgba_float(c1)
c2_frgba <- rgbwt_to_rgba_float(c2)
comb <- combine_two_rgba_float(c1_frgba,c2_frgba)
raster <- rgba_int_to_raster(rgba_float_to_rgba_int(comb))
plot(raster)
```
